mapper.select: select id AS id, create_user_id AS createUserId, canvas_info_id_private AS canvasInfoIdPrivate, canvas_info_id_public AS canvasInfoIdPublic, material_name AS materialName, material_description AS materialDescription, material_type AS materialType, material_url AS materialUrl, thumbnail_url AS thumbNail, png_url AS pngUrl, upload_time AS uploadTime, color_type AS colorType, color_percentage AS colorPercentage, is_valid AS isValid from material_info where is_valid = 1
